Class OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

A builder for [[OnmsHTTPOptions]]. Create a new one with [[OnmsHTTPOptions.newBuilder]].

  • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:28
Index

Methods

addParameter build merge setAuth setData setDefaultHeader setHeader setHeaders setParameters setServer setTimeout

Constructors

constructor

  • new OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder(
        options?: API.OnmsHTTPOptions,
    ): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • Construct a new builder from an existing options object, if provided.

    NOTE: server, auth, headers, and parameters are cloned, but data is left alone and assumed to be mutable autside of the builder or elsewhere.

    Parameters

    • Optionaloptions: API.OnmsHTTPOptions

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:48

Methods

addParameter

  • addParameter(
        parameter: string,
        value?: string | number | boolean | string[],
    ): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • A parameter to add or append to the request.

    If undefined is passed, that parameter will be reset to defaults. If the value is a string array, the existing value in the builder will be replaced. Otherwise, if the parameter already exists in the builder, the parameter will be converted to an array if necessary and this parameter will be added to it.

    Parameters

    • parameter: string

      the parameter name

    • Optionalvalue: string | number | boolean | string[]

      the value of the parameter to add (or undefined)

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:209

build

  • build(): API.OnmsHTTPOptions

  • Build the [[OnmsHTTPOptions]] object.

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptions

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:60

merge

  • merge(options?: API.OnmsHTTPOptions): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • Merge the contents of the provided [[OnmsHTTPOptions]] object, additively. Timeout, server, auth, and data will be replaced only if set, and headers and parameters will be overlayed on top of existing.

    Parameters

    • Optionaloptions: API.OnmsHTTPOptions

      the options to merge with this builder's current values

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:77

setAuth

  • setAuth(auth?: API.OnmsAuthConfig): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • The authentication config to use when connecting.

    If undefined is passed, the default authentication settings will be used.

    Parameters

    • Optionalauth: API.OnmsAuthConfig

      the authentication config

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:133

setData

  • setData(data?: any): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • The data to use in the request.

    If undefined is passed, the data will be cleared.

    Parameters

    • Optionaldata: any

      the data

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    Parameters

      the header name

    • value: string | number | boolean

setHeader

  • setHeader(
        header: string,
        value?: string | number | boolean,
    ): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • A header to set in the request.

    If undefined is passed, that header will be reset to defaults.

    Parameters

      the header name

    • Optionalvalue: string | number | boolean

      the value of the header

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:156

setHeaders

  • setHeaders(headers?: API.IHash<string>): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • The headers to set in the request.

    If undefined is passed, all headers in the builder will be reset and the default headers will be used.

    Parameters

    • Optionalheaders: API.IHash<string>

      the headers to use (or undefined)

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:144

setParameters

  • setParameters(
        parameters?: API.IHash<string | string[]>,
    ): API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

  • The parameters to pass to the request.

    If undefined is passed, all parameters in the builder will be reset.

    Parameters

    • Optionalparameters: API.IHash<string | string[]>

      the parameters to use (or undefined)

    Returns API.OnmsHTTPOptionsBuilder

    • Defined in src/api/OnmsHTTPOptions.ts:190

  • The [[OnmsServer]] to connect to.

    If undefined is passed, the default server will be used.

    Parameters

    If undefined is passed, the default timeout will be used.
